name: record-js
description: JavaScript implementation of a universal blockchain OS

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && typings install && npm run build && cp -Rn src/* build/
scripts.test: npm run dist && node --harmony test/index.js && ts-node test/index.js && bash test/index.sh && npm run lint
scripts.dist: npm run build && webpack --optimize-minimize build/index.js dist/index.js
scripts.deploy: npm run dist && gh-pages -d dist -m "Deploy $(npm view record-js version)"

author: Filip Dal√ºge <daluege@gmail.com>
